dcterms:creator: W. Bai
W. Shi
A. de Marvao
T. J. Dawes
D. P. O’Regan
S. A. Cook

dcterms:description: A dataset of 1331 healthy adults with high-spatial resolution 3D balanced steady-state free precession cine sequences assessing the left and right ventricles in their entirety in a single breath-hold.
dcterms:title: UK Digital Heart Project (UKDHP)

dcterms:creator: W. Bai
W. Shi
A. de Marvao
T. J. Dawes
D. P. O’Regan
S. A. Cook
D. Rueckert
dcterms:description: A dataset of 205 healthy adults recruited using the same LR/HR image acquisition parameters as the UKDHP, used for external validation.
dcterms:title: National Heart Center Singapore Biobank (SG)

dcterms:creator: C. Bycroft
C. Freeman
D. Petkova
G. Band
L. T. Elliott
K. Sharp
A. Motyer
D. Vukcevic
O. Delaneau
J. O’Connell
dcterms:description: A dataset of 1331 adults prospectively recruited to the UK Biobank, containing only low-resolution cine images used for generalization.
dcterms:title: UK Biobank (UKBB)
